query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Current and expected technical challenges to the technologies
result.description: D5.2. Current and expected technical challenges to the technologies, and also in respect to their related business models, providing available solutions, and recommended research for gaps and implementation plan. Special attention paid to dependencies on other policy instruments and initiatives encouraging and supporting BG strategies (M7)

result.title: Mapping of all business models
result.description: D7.3. Knowledge and insights into the inner workings (i.e. the business model mechanics) of BG business models, their strengths and weaknesses, and their social and environmental costs and benefits. Map providing an overview of all the business models showing their position in the broader BG ecosystem (value chain, sector, region).

result.title: Generic communication and dissemination package - Nr. 2
result.description:
Basic templates, formats and generic content to be used in the communication internal and external to the projects (e.g. presentations, key messages, factsheets, newsletters) will be further improved. The package will evolve over the duration of the project.
Deliverable refers to Task 4.1.

result.title: A Research Network
result.description: Establish and manage a Research Network. To represent the broader migration research community, a Research Network is established. Part of this WP will be to manage this Research Network, in terms of communication and finances.

result.title: Summer School
result.description: The ESRs: - learn to organize a scientific conference/workshop; - Learn about strengths/weaknesses of interdisciplinary work/organisation. - Learn to deal with diversity in discourses. The Summer School also organises reflection and peer-review on research by SUSPLACE Beneficiaries and partners. Furthermore cases in sustainable place-shaping will be visited and studied.

result.title: Ethics: delivery of documents
result.description: Ethics: delivery of documents, as requested by the Ethics Commission. This includes information about Third Countries, waste disposal, eventual toxicity of the chemicals used for the synthesis of the non-harmful and environmentally-friendly coatings, and exchange of samples among partners.
